snippet: Mr. Libby’s lifelong passion for growing food began when his fourth-grade teacher in Maine handed out packets of vegetable seeds to the class.
abstract: Russell Libby, leading advocate for organic farming, dies at age 56.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Libby’s lifelong passion for growing food began when his fourth-grade teacher in Maine handed out packets of vegetable seeds to the class.

headline.seo: Russell Libby, Organic Farming Advocate, Dies at 56
headline.main: Russell Libby, Organic Farming Advocate, Dies at 56
headline.print_headline:
Russell Libby, 56, Advocate
For Nation’s Organic Farmers
